description.narrative: Specialized child protection services at national and subnational levels are strengthened

mailing-address.narrative: 87 Misr Helwan Agricultural Road Maadi Cairo

sector.narrative: Alternative care reform and service provision
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Relief co-ordination, protection and support services
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Social welfare workforce systems strengthening (accreditation, staffing and supervision)

title.narrative: UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Specialized child protection services at national and subnational levels are strengthened

description.narrative: A case management system is developed and introduced at sub-national level in selected governorates as per legal provisions, to ensure quality preventive and responsive services to children at risk. In 2017, the system provided case management to more than 4,000 children. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/12/2017
